about_the_game:
[Story]
In a world where YouTube has become a powerful entertainment industry,

The protagonist starts an early YouTube business, discovering talented streamers and becoming the CEO of a hugely successful entertainment company.

He discovers famous streamers like [BJ Bitna, BJ Kyeonwang, BJ Siksinyang, and BJ Talgeo] and builds the world's leading YouTube entertainment company.

However, one day, due to rumors and sexual harassment allegations involving 'BJ Bitna,' the protagonist faces a major setback and is ultimately ousted from his position as CEO by the board of directors.

But this was all a scheme orchestrated by the board and 'BJ Bitna' to remove the protagonist from power. Left penniless, the protagonist becomes homeless.

Despite this betrayal, the protagonist, who had always protected and supported the streamers, still has people who believe in him.

Among them, a rookie streamer named 'BJ Hanna' continues to believe in the protagonist, and she reveals to him the conspiracy involving the board and Bitna.

She then reaches out to the homeless protagonist, offering him her hand.

Wounded deeply by betrayal, the protagonist gains courage from BJ Hanna's warm smile and support, and decides to challenge the top once again.

Together, the protagonist and BJ Hanna establish their own entertainment company and start over from the ground up.

[How to Play]

  • The actions you choose will pass a certain amount of time.

  • A day is divided into morning, afternoon, and evening.

  • Invest in BJ Hanna’s health, beauty, etc.

  • If you're low on money, do part-time jobs through Everyday Hanna.

  • Save up money to purchase broadcasting equipment and outfits.

  • Recruit more viewers and earn the 'World Button' medal.


[Game Features]

  • The game consists of more than 8 different multi-endings.

  • All female characters are fully voiced in Japanese.

  • Depending on the ending, you can enjoy different H-scenes.

content_descriptors.notes:
[Detailed description of adult content]
This game contains adult language and fictional characters depicting sexual situations.
All persons depicted are over 20 years of age.
Because it is an adult story, it contains female nudity, sexual acts, and various sexual fantasies.

- Contains graphic sex scenes
- BDSM costumes
- Suggestive content, and explicit scenes.
- Full nudity
- Explicit dialog
- Sexual fantasies with exaggerated characters

detailed_description:
[Story]
In a world where YouTube has become a powerful entertainment industry,

The protagonist starts an early YouTube business, discovering talented streamers and becoming the CEO of a hugely successful entertainment company.

He discovers famous streamers like [BJ Bitna, BJ Kyeonwang, BJ Siksinyang, and BJ Talgeo] and builds the world's leading YouTube entertainment company.

However, one day, due to rumors and sexual harassment allegations involving 'BJ Bitna,' the protagonist faces a major setback and is ultimately ousted from his position as CEO by the board of directors.

But this was all a scheme orchestrated by the board and 'BJ Bitna' to remove the protagonist from power. Left penniless, the protagonist becomes homeless.

Despite this betrayal, the protagonist, who had always protected and supported the streamers, still has people who believe in him.

Among them, a rookie streamer named 'BJ Hanna' continues to believe in the protagonist, and she reveals to him the conspiracy involving the board and Bitna.

She then reaches out to the homeless protagonist, offering him her hand.

Wounded deeply by betrayal, the protagonist gains courage from BJ Hanna's warm smile and support, and decides to challenge the top once again.

Together, the protagonist and BJ Hanna establish their own entertainment company and start over from the ground up.

[How to Play]

  • The actions you choose will pass a certain amount of time.

  • A day is divided into morning, afternoon, and evening.

  • Invest in BJ Hanna’s health, beauty, etc.

  • If you're low on money, do part-time jobs through Everyday Hanna.

  • Save up money to purchase broadcasting equipment and outfits.

  • Recruit more viewers and earn the 'World Button' medal.


[Game Features]

  • The game consists of more than 8 different multi-endings.

  • All female characters are fully voiced in Japanese.

  • Depending on the ending, you can enjoy different H-scenes.

name: Streaming ON! VTuber Training

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Window10/11
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: The protagonist is the successful CEO of a YouTube entertainment company. One day, due to a conspiracy, he is ousted from the company and becomes penniless. The female protagonist, BJ Hanna, appears before him, giving him the courage to try again, and together, they start over from the ground up.
